question_text:
Question 4 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
MSQ (1M) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Question ID : 823251544 
 
Which of the following standard C library functions will always invoke a system call when executed 
from a single-threaded process in a UNIX/LINUX Operating system ? 
 
(A) sleep  
(B) strlen  
(C) malloc  
(D) exit  
Ans. 
A, D
